description: Yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, he focuses on bringing people together around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work explores the evolution of 'ecosystem' from biology to metaphor, introducing 'ecosystem architecture' as an approach to designing modern, decentralized organizations. Yeehaa advocates for embracing internet fragmentation as an opportunity for innovation and diversity, while also emphasizing the importance of sustainable, equitable solutions that enhance both human communities and the environment.
blurb: Yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, combines education transformation, entrepreneurship, and coding. Based in Taipei, he explores decentralized organizations, internet fragmentation, and sustainable digital ecosystems through his writings and courses.
